testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify the warning modal appears when regrading a question that has in progress attempts at an old revision

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the warning modal appears when regrading a question that has in progress attempts at an old revision
